pullrequest.title: Mouse selection highlights objects & scene tree is resizable

content.raw:
I can't say that I understand everything that's going on in this patch, but I didn't see anything obviously wrong.   John, if you're happy, please go ahead and merge it.  After we get a clean build from Jenkins I'll kick off deb builds.

A subsequent pull request to land those two mutex changes would also be good.
content.html:
I can't say that I understand everything that's going on in this patch, but I didn't see anything obviously wrong. John, if you're happy, please go ahead and merge it. After we get a clean build from Jenkins I'll kick off deb builds.

A subsequent pull request to land those two mutex changes would also be good.
